data.text: Awurade, kae nea aba yɛn so;
Wɔadan yɛn agyapade ama ahɔho,
Yɛayɛ nyisaa na yenni agyanom,
Ɛsɛ sɛ yɛtɔ nsu a yɛnom;
Wɔn a wɔtaa yɛn no abɛn yɛn pɛɛ;
Yɛde yɛn ho maa Misraim ne Asiria
Yɛn agyanom yɛɛ bɔne, na wonni hɔ bio,
Nkoa di yɛn so,
Yɛde yɛn nkwa bɔ afɔre de pɛ yɛn anoduan,
Yɛn honam adɔ sɛ fononoo.
Wɔato mmea mmonnaa wɔ Sion,
Wɔkyekyere mmapɔmma nsa na wɔasɛn wɔn;
Mmerante yɛ adwumaden wɔ awiyammo so;
Mpanyimfo ntena kuropɔn apon ano bio;
Ahosɛpɛw afi yɛn koma mu;
Ahenkyɛw afi yɛn ti so.
Eyi nti yɛn koma atɔ beraw,
wɔ Sion bepɔw a ada mpan
Wo, Awurade, di hene afebɔɔ;
Adɛn nti na wo werɛ fi yɛn daa yi?
Ka yɛn bata wo ho bio, Awurade, na yɛatumi asan aba wo nkyɛn;
gye sɛ woapo yɛn koraa
